name: Johnnie Lee CROPPS, III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Cropps v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Johnnie Lee CROPPS, III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
' AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Johnnie Lee Cropps, III, pro se.
Tara Leigh Patterson, Robert Campolongo, Harrisburg, for Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1275
Johnnie Lee CROPPS, III, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 13, 2002.
Johnnie Lee Cropps, III, pro se.
Tara Leigh Patterson, Robert Campolongo, Harrisburg, for Board of Probation and Parole.
